action.action-desc: Received and read the first time
Read the second time and placed on the calendar

form.official-title: Making continuing appropriations for veterans benefits for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes.

section.text: That the following sums are hereby appropriated, out of any money in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated, and out of applicable corporate or other revenues, receipts, and funds, for veterans benefits for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes, namely:

subsection.text: Notwithstanding section 103, obligations for mandatory payments due on or about the first day of any month that begins after October 2013 but not later than 30 days after the date specified in section 103(3) may continue to be made, and funds shall be available for such payments.

section.text: Unless otherwise provided for in this joint resolution or in the applicable appropriations Act for fiscal year 2014, appropriations and funds made available and authority granted pursuant to this joint resolution shall be available until whichever of the following first occurs:

subsection.text: the enactment into law of an appropriation for any project or activity provided for in this joint resolution;

paragraph.text: the enactment into law of the applicable appropriations Act for fiscal year 2014 without any provision for such project or activity; or

section.text: It is the sense of Congress that this joint resolution may also be referred to as the Honoring Our Promise to America’s Veterans Act.
This joint resolution may be cited as the Veterans Benefits Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014 .

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives October 3, 2013.
